kashmir-calling.title: Kashmir Calling – A Complete Valley Experience
kashmir-calling.location: Srinagar, Pahalgam, Gulmarg, Jammu & Kashmir, India
kashmir-calling.description: A magical exploration through Kashmir’s iconic destinations—Srinagar’s lakes and gardens, Pahalgam’s meadows, and Gulmarg’s alpine adventures.
kashmir-calling.longDescription:
Nestled in the northernmost part of India, Kashmir is often referred to as 'Heaven on Earth' due to its unmatched natural beauty, serene valleys, snow-clad mountains, and tranquil lakes. This enchanting region has a rich tapestry of history, blending ancient traditions with modern culture.

Kashmir's history dates back to ancient times when it was an important center of Hinduism and Buddhism. The region later saw the arrival of Islam in the 14th century, which shaped its cultural and architectural landscape. The Mughal emperors were captivated by Kashmir's beauty, leading to the construction of iconic Mughal gardens that still mesmerize visitors today.

The region is renowned for its handwoven Pashmina shawls, intricate handicrafts, and world-famous saffron. Its stunning landscapes have inspired poets, artists, and travelers for centuries, making it a must-visit destination for anyone seeking a blend of natural splendor and cultural richness.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Gondola Tickets or any other tickets
Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent
Entrance fees to monuments and museum
Other meals not mentioned laundry, telephone calls, and incidentals.
Any personal expenses. Room service and special orders. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
Any expense arising due to unforeseen circumstances is not included.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Srinagar – Stay in Nigeen Lake Houseboat
activities: Arrival and transfer to Nigeen Lake houseboat
Evening Shikara ride on Nigeen Lake
Overnight stay at the houseboat

itineraryDays.title: Srinagar to Pahalgam – En Route Saffron Fields and Avantipora Ruins
activities: Visit Pampore saffron fields (seasonal)
Explore Avantipora ruins
Arrive and check-in at Pahalgam hotel
Visit Aru Valley or Betaab Valley (optional pony rides)
Evening by the Lidder River
Overnight stay in Pahalgam

itineraryDays.title: Pahalgam to Gulmarg – Journey Through Scenic Meadows
activities: Drive from Pahalgam to Gulmarg
Ride the Gulmarg Gondola to Apharwat Peak
Visit Gulmarg Golf Course (seasonal)
Overnight stay in Gulmarg

itineraryDays.title: Gulmarg to Srinagar – Mughal Gardens and Dal Lake Exploration
activities: Visit Nishat Bagh, Shalimar Bagh, and Chashme Shahi
Walk along Dal Lake Boulevard or shop for Kashmiri crafts
Optional: Traditional Wazwan dinner
Overnight stay in Srinagar

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Srinagar
activities: Free time for personal exploration
Transfer to Srinagar Airport for departure

magical-kashmir.title: Magical Kashmir Escape
magical-kashmir.location: Srinagar, Pahalgam, Gulmarg, Sonmarg, Jammu & Kashmir, India
magical-kashmir.description: A complete escape into Kashmir’s most scenic gems—Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Sonmarg, and Srinagar—with unforgettable houseboat stays and local delicacies.

The region is renowned for its handwoven Pashmina shawls, intricate handicrafts, and world-famous saffron. Its stunning landscapes have inspired poets, artists, and travelers for centuries, making it a must-visit destination for anyone seeking a blend of natural splendor and cultural richness.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Srinagar – Houseboat Stay on Nigeen Lake
activities: Arrival and transfer to Nigeen Lake deluxe houseboat
Shikara ride on Nigeen and Dal Lakes
Explore floating gardens and market
Try Rogan Josh, Tabak Maaz, and Kehwa
Overnight stay on houseboat

itineraryDays.title: Srinagar to Gulmarg
activities: Transfer to Gulmarg
Gondola ride to Kongdoori and Apharwat Peak
Seasonal activities: skiing/snowboarding or nature walks/golf
Try Haak Saag and Dum Aloo
Overnight stay in Gulmarg

itineraryDays.title: Gulmarg to Pahalgam
activities: Visit saffron fields of Pampore and Awantipora ruins en route
Explore Aru Valley, Betaab Valley, and Chandanwari
Stroll along Lidder River and explore local market
Try Yakhni and Nadru Yakhni
Overnight stay in Pahalgam

itineraryDays.title: Pahalgam to Srinagar
activities: Drive to Srinagar and hotel check-in
Visit Mughal Gardens: Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, and Chashme Shahi
Visit Shankaracharya Temple
Optional cultural performance
Try Modur Pulao and Seekh Kebab
Overnight stay in Srinagar

itineraryDays.title: Day Trip to Sonmarg
activities: Full-day excursion to Sonmarg
Optional pony ride or trek to Thajiwas Glacier
Picnic or café lunch by the river
Try Rista and Shab Deg
Return to Srinagar for overnight stay

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Srinagar
activities: Breakfast and final shopping or relaxation
Transfer to Srinagar Airport for departure

activities: Arrival at Srinagar Airport and transfer to houseboat on Nigeen Lake

itineraryDays.title: Srinagar to Gurez – Gateway to Untouched Beauty
activities: Scenic drive to Gurez Valley via Razdan Pass
Explore Habba Khatoon Peak and Dawar Village
Evening relaxation in Gurez

itineraryDays.title: Gurez Exploration – Untouched Nature and Local Culture
activities: Visit Tulail Valley and interact with locals
Optional: short treks, nature walks, Khandiyal Mosque visit
Evening by the riverside or under the stars

activities: Drive through forests and villages to Gulmarg
Gulmarg Gondola Ride to Apharwat Peak
Optional: skiing, snowboarding, golfing, pony ride

activities: Drive to Srinagar

Shankaracharya Temple visit and cultural shopping

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Srinagar
activities: Free morning or last-minute shopping

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Srinagar – Houseboat Stay on Nigeen Lake
activities: Arrival at Srinagar Airport and transfer to houseboat on Nigeen Lake
Relax and enjoy serene atmosphere
Shikara ride across Nigeen and Dal Lakes

activities: Drive to Pahalgam (Valley of Shepherds)
Visit Saffron Fields of Pampore
Explore ancient Awantipora Ruins
View cascading Lidder River
Leisure strolls or shopping in local markets
Relish Gushtaba or Noon Chai

itineraryDays.title: Pahalgam Sightseeing and Return to Srinagar
activities: Visit Aru Valley
Explore Betaab Valley
Visit Chandanwari
Return to Srinagar and check-in
Leisure evening or visit Boulevard Road
